title: Chris Skidmore – 2020 Comments on UK/EU Trade Deal
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Chris Skidmore, the Conservative MP for Kingswood, on 24 December 2020.
content:
Woke up to news of potential Deal with EU. Incredibly exciting if true and a triumph for Boris Johnson and David Frost to have achieved this. Happy to back it. We need a deal and we need to move on. #GetItDone
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
